reviews.text: Food was decent and the prices were very reasonable. There's plenty of choices from one end of the street to the next end. A must visit when you come to Chumphon.
So fun ! Got the deepfried bread with coconut frosting
Night market not big but definetelly worth visiting
Nice attraction for tourist that visit Chumphon. The mango rice and the thai pastry shop next to it is a must try and you can find all sorts of delicious desserts along the night bazaar.

Best shredded chilli beef in Manchester. Most places you get hard pipe cleaners - this place does it right. Rest of food is great as well if you are looking for something slightly different to your average English Chinese restaurant.  Good busy atmosphere with a largely Chinese client base - always a good sign.
Nice food, love the food there and reasonable price with reasonable portion. However, the tables are a bit crowd. But a good place to have Chinese food!
Good Chinese Food restaurant? you worth to try when you travelling to UK
Nice place but very small portion of meat.

Such a nice little restaurant. Service was great, staff are attentive without being in your face, portion size good, prices great. The only problem I have is quite a few items had been tagged as sold out.

Currently under construction but still has beautiful views of the river valley and downtown Edmonton. The food is pretty decent as well but I always go for the views. Once the renovations are done, I recommend making a reservation to eat on their patio because of the beautiful scenery. I would definitely recommend this place anytime in summer or fall, weather permitting.

Went to Riverside Bistro Saturday April 6, 2019 for a romantic evening and for a place that is reservation only you would expect good quality food. However, that was not the case at this restaurant.  We ordered an appetizer to start and it was so cold. We ordered the beer batter cauliflower and for a deep fried dish you would think you would see the steam coming out when you cut into the cauliflower but that was not the case. It came time to order our main course and they ran out of Jerk Chicken. The Jerk Chicken is the only chicken dish on the menu.... another disappointment. To say the least our evening just got better and better. We had ordered the 8oz steak and it was pathetic. It was worse then a truck stop steak. I got the vegetarian burger and it was really boring and dry. I found for a higher end restaurant that is "reservation only" to be on the lower end scale and over priced for what you get and the service was mediocre. The only good thing about this experience was the view. I personally would not recommend this place to anyone. Despite the view.... I would rather spend that kind of money elsewhere.

Had some food with the wife here and it was fine
    Love the big chairs ..

The patio has one of the best views in the city, so it's a great place for lunch on a nice summer day. Good is okay; about what one might expect from a hotel restaurant. Filling, and tasty enough, but nothing special. The times I've been there, service has been hit and miss. On one occasion, though I had a reservation, I was still asked to wait about 10 minutes.

Very friendly staff, the view is gorgeous and the plating is amazing. Can't give it 5 stars because some items are overpriced. But overall, the experience was lovely and would visit again for a special occasion.

Sugar Shack Pizza has clearly modeled itself well after a western-themed pizza and beer spot. I was surprised at how good the pizza was. Thin crispy crust, good sauce and cheese, and a variety of topping options. Pretty good beer list too, even including some American microbrews. Just a short walk from my hotel and the Google office. I'll definitely go back on my next trip to Beijing.
